name: EscapeRoom(AdventureGame)
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: escape room
des:
You are trapped in a room. It is up to you to figure out how to escape!

Inspired by various real escape rooms. Rather than using just your smarts you will need your imagination as well. It is up to you to paint a picture of the room, interact with the environment and escape.

You have a few commands at your disposal:
 1. Look <Direction> ex. look left - Alexa will describe the scene to you.
 2. Inspect <Object> ex. inspect door - Alexa will describe and interact with an object in the scene more closely.
 3. Use <Item> on <Object> ex. use hammer on window - Alexa will use on of your items to interact with an object in the environment.
 4. Inventory - Alexa will list all the items you have.
 5. Wait - Alexa will wait a little while. 

Note: Sometimes Alexa will repeat what you have already heard. You can simply interrupt her by saying "Alexa" followed by one of the commands above.

More rooms will be added!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
